thread.title: Mariah Carey and James Packer’s Airbnb love nest will set you back $14,000 a night | Travel | Travel Holiday Deals
thread.title_full: Mariah Carey and James Packer’s Airbnb love nest will set you back $14,000 a night | Travel | Travel News and Holiday Deals | | The Advertiser

author: Network Vision Writers
title: Mariah Carey and James Packer’s Airbnb love nest will set you back $14,000 a night | Travel | Travel Holiday Deals
text:
MARIAH Carey is proving once and for all she knows how to holiday in style, booking out an incredible Malibu mansion in an area aptly nicknamed Billionaire’s Beach.
The singer, who’s been romantically linked to Aussie billionaire James Packer, is staying at the $14,000-a-night property for a few weeks on-and-off while she takes a break from her Vegas show, ahead of concert in Israel.
Packer is in Australia on business but will reportedly be returning to his lady love shortly.
Malibu break (Frame content direct link: https://www.instagram.com/p/5w29mVLeK7/embed .)
Billion-dollar view ... No wonder it . Picture: airbnb Source: Supplied
The four bedroom, four bathroom elegantly furnished Mediterranean villa located right on the beach is any holiday-maker’s dream, and Carey and Packer are sparing no expense as they continue their globetrotting whirlwind romance. Beachside relaxing ... You couldn’t get any more beachfront than this. Picture: airbnb Source: Supplied
Snapped by a throng of paparazzi wherever they go, it’s not often we get to actually check out the interior of their lavish lifestyle — but with this sumptuous Airbnb listing we can see their digs for ourselves. (The listing has been swiftly removed from the Airbnb website this morning)
Making a grand entrance ... The magnificent open plan offers great views of the beach. Picture: airbnb Source: Supplied
The property boasts living room with fireplace, large entertaining bar, indoor/outdoor spa jacuzzi, high ceilings, walls of french doors. A gourmet kitchen with an open see-through fireplace opens on a grand dining area.
Rub a dub dub ... The lagoon-like bath is positively diva-worthy. Picture: airbnb Source: Supplied
But wait til you hear about the large luxurious bath suite with steam room and beach-facing balcony — which surely a diva like Mariah is perfectly suited to.
Master suite ... With views overlooking Carbon Beach. Picture: airbnb Source: Supplied
According to E! Mariah has already hit up the local eatery Nobu and has “fallen in love” with the home.
Sumptuous ... The shower alone looks bigger than an inner-Sydney studio apartment. Picture: airbnb Source: Supplied
We bet the pair will feel right at home with neighbours Oracle CEO Larry Ellison, entertainment mogul David Geffen, former Dodgers CEO Jamie McCourt, and other business tycoons.
Meals with friends ... Though Mariah doesn’t seem like the type to slave over a hot stove. Picture: airbnb Source: Supplied
You too could hit up the property for a night or two, providing you’ve got a spare few thousand or 10 in the bank.
